item.title: By: anthony
item.dc:creator: anthony
item.description: why didnt you review any scorpyd cross bows. I own 9 cross bows. 4 of them are high end. I will put it up against my 10 point any day, interms of speed, accuracy, and trigger pull. Anthony
item.content:encoded:
why didnt you review any scorpyd cross bows. I own 9 cross bows. 4 of them are high end. I will put it up against my 10 point any day, interms of speed, accuracy, and trigger pull.
Anthony
